sentences.en: A new method to study wet - etching process, infrared thermal image, is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种研究湿法腐蚀进程的新方法 ——— 红外热像法.

sentences.en: Die - cutting tool version by chemical etching and mechanical engraving made by.
sentences.cn: 模切 刀版利用化学腐蚀法和机械雕刻法制作而成.

sentences.en: EPR method is consistent with the acid etching test.
sentences.cn: EPR法 与草酸电解浸蚀试验结果相吻合.

sentences.en: Hanging on the wall was a fine etching of the church.
sentences.cn: 挂在墙上的是一幅精致的教堂蚀刻板画.

sentences.en: Mary is very keen on etching.
Normally for bulk glass, etching increases the strength.
sentences.cn: 对于块状玻璃, 腐蚀通常都使强度提高.

sentences.en: One reasonable explanation is that etching removes and blunts microcracks.
sentences.cn: 有一种合理的解释是说腐蚀能够去掉并钝化微裂纹.

sentences.en: That is a beautiful etching of a bird.
sentences.cn: 那是一只鸟的漂亮的蚀刻画.

sentences.en: The artist must have spent hours etching the image on the glass.
sentences.cn: 这位美术家一定花了好几小时把这画像蚀刻在玻璃上.

sentences.en: The concern with etching beyond this point should be clear.
sentences.cn: 刻蚀超越此值的后果应该是清楚的.

sentences.en: The resolution of an etching process is a measure of the fidelity of pattern transfer.
sentences.cn: 刻蚀工艺的分辨率是图形转移保真度的量度.

sentences.en: The selective etching of the evaporated or squeezed layers is a critical step in preserving yield.
sentences.cn: 蒸发层和溅射层的选择刻蚀是保证成品的关键步骤.

sentences.en: The technology used for making the objects is that of bending metal tubes and wood etching.
sentences.cn: 制作那个物体用到的技术有金属管弯曲和木料蚀刻。

sentences.en: The weird figures of the etching haunted my fitful sleep.
sentences.cn: 那幅版画上鬼怪似的人物形象在我辗转反侧的半睡眠中忽隐忽现.

sentences.en: Three potentials pertinent to various etching techniques are labeled in Fig. 10.
sentences.cn: 与各种蚀刻技术有关的三个电势标出在图10中.

words.tran_cn: 蚀刻师；腐蚀铜版制作者

phrases.tran_cn: 酸浸；玻璃蚀刻法；酸性浸蚀

trans.tran_en: a picture made by printing from an etched metal plate

trans.tran_cn: 用针和酸类在金属板上蚀刻（图画等）( etch的现在分词 )，（感情）明显地表露在（脸上），（脸上）明显流露出（感情），铭刻在心里/记忆里/脑海里
